availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Almanzor Holmes (Montgomery and Powell County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Montgomery and Powell County, Kentucky, farmer. Montgomery County, Kentucky, native. Son of John Holmes and Susan Holmes. Married to Sarah Maxwell Holmes in Powell County, Kentucky, on October 17, 1852. Father of Luellen Holmes, James Holmes, and Mary Holmes. Resident of Montgomery County in 1850. Farmer in Powell County in 1860. Farmer in Powell County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, District No. 2, p. 53A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Powell County, p. 10.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Powell County, Precinct No. 4, p. 155B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Powell County, KY, October 1863, p. 173.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994053, Powell County Marriages.
